# Repository Description

**TheDhanMatrix** is a premium wealth management platform that combines cutting-edge UI/UX design with powerful investment tracking tools. Built with Next.js 14, Firebase, and modern web technologies, it offers a professional-grade fintech experience with glassmorphic design, interactive wealth calculators, and real-time portfolio analytics.
